name: Initialize and edit sensor refresh interval

svgString:
<svg x="0" y="0" height="350" viewBox="-0.04032258064515237 0 250.0806451612903 350" width="250" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet">
  <rect id="svgEditorBackground" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="100" style="fill:none; stroke: none;" />
  <rect x="24.4768" y="29.7427" style="fill:#DBDBDB;stroke:black;stroke-width:1px;" id="e1_rectangle" width="197.628" height="269.784" />
  <rect x="81.862" y="230.934" style="fill:#4D4D4D;stroke:black;stroke-width:1px;" id="e2_rectangle" width="85.806" height="68.306" />
  <rect x="112.345" y="219.644" style="fill:rosybrown;stroke:black;stroke-width:1px;" id="svg_workpiece" width="25.403" height="13.548" />
  <polygon style="stroke:black;fill:#595959;stroke-width:1px;" points="24.281,29.966 24.281,107.305 113.475,106.176 114.039,176.741 134.926,176.741 134.926,105.612 221.297,107.305 221.862,29.402" id="e1_polygon" />
  <polygon style="stroke: black; fill: rgb(140, 140, 140); stroke-width: 1px;" id="svg_press_element" points="107.829,108.999 107.265,178.435 90.3291,178.999 90.3291,197.628 160.894,197.063 160.33,178.998 142.265,178.434 141.136,108.998" />

    <animate 
       xlink:href="#svg_press_element"
       attributeName="points"
       from="107.829,108.999 107.265,178.435 90.3291,178.999 90.3291,197.628 160.894,197.063 160.33,178.998 142.265,178.434 141.136,108.998"
       to="107.829,139.483 107.265,208.919 90.3291,209.483 90.3291,228.112 160.894,227.547 160.33,209.482 142.265,208.918 141.136,139.482" 
       dur="6s"
       begin="unload"
       fill="freeze"
       id="press_down_anim"/>
       
    <animate 
       xlink:href="#svg_press_element"
       attributeName="points"
       from="107.829,139.483 107.265,208.919 90.3291,209.483 90.3291,228.112 160.894,227.547 160.33,209.482 142.265,208.918 141.136,139.482"
       to="107.829,108.999 107.265,178.435 90.3291,178.999 90.3291,197.628 160.894,197.063 160.33,178.998 142.265,178.434 141.136,108.998" 
       dur="4s"
       begin="press_down_anim.begin + 7s"
       fill="freeze" 
       id="press_up_anim"/>
       
    <animate 
       xlink:href="#svg_workpiece"
       attributeName="opacity"
       from="0"
       to="1" 
       dur="0.5s"
       fill="freeze" 
       id="workpiece_show_anim"/>
       
    <animate 
       xlink:href="#svg_workpiece"
       attributeName="opacity"
       from="1"
       to="0" 
       dur="0.5s"
       fill="freeze" 
       id="workpiece_hide_anim"/>

</svg>
